nodes.documentation:
@dev Public function to check if contractor has been registered
@return A bool value to check if contractor exists
nodes.name: existContractor

devdoc.details: Contract defining functionalities of the Toll Management System.

balanceOf(address).details: Public function that returns the balance of the specified address.

params._owner: The account address of whose balance is being checked.

balanceOf(address).return: An uint256 representing the amount owned by the passed address.

params._tokens: number of tokens the user wishes to purchase If the user requests more tokens than is available in the contract, the mint function is called to mint new tokens to satisfy the user request, and have an additional 10000 tokens in the total supply.
params._user: pass user address who wants to purchase tokens

existContractor().details: Public function to check if contractor has been registered
existContractor().return: A bool value to check if contractor exists

params._user: pass the user address to pay tolls

payToll(address).return: A bool value to show function execution status

registerContractor(address).details: Public function to register Contractor, restricted access to owner using modifier

params._contractor: pass the address of contractor to be registered

registerContractor(address).return: A bool value to show function execution status

registerUser(address,string).details: Public function to register new User, restricted access using modifier

params._user: pass the address of user to be registered
params._vehicleNum: pass the vehicle number to be registered

registerUser(address,string).return: A bool value to show function execution status

totalSupply().details: Total number of tokens in existence.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Public function that transfers tokens to a specified address.

params._to: The address to transfer tokens to.

viewHistory(address).details: Public function to view Toll Payment history

params._user: pass owner or contractor address to view complete toll payment history

viewHistory(address).return: An array of uint256 to return the toll receipts

viewUsers(address).details: Public function to view registered user details

params._user: pass user address to view details

viewUsers(address).return: An address, string, and uint256 representing registered user details

withdrawToken(uint256).details: Public function to withdraw tokens, access restricted using modifier

params._value: Number of tokens requested by contractor

withdrawToken(uint256).return: A bool value to check function execution status Withdrawal is restricted to 80 while the contract is live. Once it terminates, the contractor can withdraw the whole amount without limitations.

devdoc.title: Buy
